name: Torch Partners
overview: Torch Partners is a leading independent investment bank, active across Europe and internationally. Torch specialises in providing advice on M&A, fundraising in the private and public markets and related corporate strategy advice to companies with a focus on the following sectors: • Consumer internet and digital media • Fintech • Hosting, datacenters and internet infrastructure • SaaS and enterprise software • Cleantech, resources and renewables Clients range from high-growth start-ups to listed companies, as well as the leading players in private equity and venture capital. Torch has established a reputation for providing top-quality, strategic advice to some of Europe’s highest profile growth businesses, helping them to develop into the leaders in their fields. The firm derives its success from the team’s rigorous analytical approach, in-depth sector knowledge and entrepreneurial atmosphere.
